$description:
| What does this do? | Ensures that collaboration invitations are sent to allowed domains only |
| Why should you use this? | Ensures proper governance controls for guest users by configuring a list of allowed domains. |
| What is the end-user impact? | Users will only be able to invite guests from organizationally approved list of partner organizations/domains. |
| Learn more | [Allow/deny list](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/active-directory/external-identities/allow-deny-list) |
